- Simple barbicels: barbicels without hooks.  
- Branching simple barbicels: simple barbicels that branch out from the main barb.  
- Hooked branching barbicels: barbicels that branch out from the main barb and have hooks at the ends.  
- Branching hooked barbicels: barbicels that branch out from the main barb and have hooks along the length of the barb.  
- Simple branching barbicels: barbicels that branch out from the main barb but do not have hooks.  
- Hooked simple barbicels: barbicels that are attached to the main barb and have hooks along the length of the barb.
